name: Rosso Corsa
description: Rosso Corsa is a sophisticated oscilloscope-themed robot. With its classic buttons and soldier-like arms and legs, it combines elegance and strength. Its vibrant red color, reminiscent of the iconic Rosso Corsa racing car, makes it stand out among other robots. The screen, in a playful twist, displays a cute cat. To complete its look, Rosso Corsa wears stylish glasses as an addon, giving it an air of intelligence and sophistication.
